resources.string: This application reads and writes data from/to a MIFARE Ultralight NFC tag.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read data
3 read counter = read one or more counters on the tag
4 write data
5 write counter = increment one or more counters
This app works with a MIFARE Ultralight tag for reading
This example expects a MIFARE Ultralight type tag. The tag should use only the well known keys A and B for authentication.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This example reads an Ultralight C or EV1 tag type and shows the value of the counter(s).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
This app works with a MIFARE Ultralight tag for writing
This example writes data to a page on a MIFARE Ultralight tag
Increment the value of a counter
This example increases the counter on an Ultralight C or EV1 tag type and shows the value of the counter(s).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
The increasing of a counter is not reversible and not resettable, so please act with caution
